title: DOJ sues California over ‘sanctuary’ policies
text:
DOJ sues California over ‘sanctuary’ policies 7:32am EST - 01:40 
The U.S. Justice Department is suing the state of California over so-called ''sanctuary'' policies that try to protect illegal immigrants against deportation, ramping up a confrontation over whether local police should enforce federal law. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The U.S. Justice Department is suing the state of California over so-called "sanctuary" policies that try to protect illegal immigrants against deportation, ramping up a confrontation over whether local police should enforce federal law.
